name: Global Regulatory Communications
goal: Global Regulatory Communications provides solutions to the regulatory needs of businesses operating in regulated sectors worldwide, such as pharmaceuticals, chemicals, cosmetics, and pesticides.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Occasionally I represent some of my non-pharmaceutical industry clients on professional trade associations that have the objective of directly or indirectly influencing the formulation or implementation of policy and the decision-making processes of the EU institutions that are pertinent to their business sector.

I do not represent any clients from the pharmaceutical industry in this type of activity, as it is not related to any legislation not policies that impact the pharmaceutical industry.
